mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_doc (writer_id, type_id, title, content, status) VALUES (#{writerId}, #{typeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT approval_doc_id AS docId, writer_id AS writerId, type_id AS typeId, title AS title, content AS content, status AS status, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM approval_doc WHERE approval_doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_line (approval_doc_id, approver_id, order_num, status) VALUES (#{docId}, #{approverId}, #{orderNum}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT approval_type_id AS approvalTypeId, type_name AS typeName FROM approval_type ORDER BY approval_type_id ASC
SELECT user_id AS userId, user_login_id AS loginId, user_password AS password, user_name AS userName FROM User WHERE user_login_id = #{loginId} LIMIT 1

SELECT l.approval_line_id AS lineId, l.approval_doc_id AS docId, l.approver_id AS userId, u.user_name AS username, l.order_num AS orderNum, l.status AS status, l.approved_at AS approvedAt FROM approval_line l JOIN User u ON u.user_id = l.approver_id WHERE l.approval_doc_id = #{docId} ORDER BY l.order_num ASC, l.approval_line_id ASC

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS username, d.dept_name AS deptName, r.rank_name AS rankName, u.user_status AS userStatus FROM User u LEFT JOIN dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id LEFT JOIN ranks r ON r.rank_id = u.rank_id WHERE u.user_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY d.dept_name ASC, r.rank_id ASC, u.user_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM approval_line WHERE approval_doc_id = #{docId} AND status = 'APPROVED'
mapper.update: UPDATE approval_line SET status = 'REJECTED', approved_at = NOW() WHERE approval_doc_id = #{docId} AND status = 'WAITING'
UPDATE approval_line SET status = 'REJECTED', comment = #{comment}, approved_at = NOW() WHERE approval_doc_id = #{docId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'WAITING'
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(order_num) FROM approval_line WHERE approval_doc_id = #{docId} AND status = 'PENDING'
SELECT file_id AS fileId, doc_id AS docId, original_name AS originalName, saved_name AS savedName FROM approval_file WHERE doc_id = #{docId} ORDER BY file_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_file (doc_id, original_name, saved_name) VALUES (#{docId}, #{originalName}, #{savedName})
